education.degree: College of Computing and Software Engineering, M.S. Computer Science
College of the Arts, B.M. Music Performance

work.description: I leveraged a variety of technologies to help solve problems our clients were facing. I further developed my command of front-end and back-end technologies, gained new experience with cloud computing, and improved my communication and teamwork skills.

Working as the sole software developer on a team I designed, implemented, and supported an internal business application that was used by thousands of UPS employees globally. This application supported these employees to provide a higher level of customer service and resulted in millions of dollars of additional revenue just in the first year of limited roll out.

certifications.name: Associate Cloud Engineer
certifications.description: An Associate Cloud Engineer deploys applications, monitors operations, and manages enterprise solutions. This individual is able to use Google Cloud Console and the command-line interface to perform common platform-based tasks to maintain one or more deployed solutions that leverage Google-managed or self-managed services on Google Cloud.

projects.name: clang-rs
description: Provides a Rust interface to libclang (the C API for the Clang compiler)
Allows for safer and more idiomatic usage of libclang from Rust

projects.name: eslint-plugin-ordered-imports
description: Provides an ESLint plugin which enforces customizable import ordering rules
